news.title: Nashik realty sector growing: Radhakrishna Game, Divisional Commissioner
news.para: Game added that Nashik has so far recorded 1.42 lakh property transactions in the current financial year. In the last financial year, the number stood at about 1.15 lakh.

news.title: About 70% of Gurugram's 2,000 guesthouses are illegal, reveals government survey
news.para: District town planner (enforcement) Amit Madholia said despite there being various hotels in the city, these guesthouses in residential areas are functioning as an alternate facility to the various medical, IT and industrial companies set up in Gurgaon.

news.title: Ludhiana Improvement Trust gets nod for construction of Atal Apartments
news.para: The approval took so long in view of the ongoing vigilance inquiry into works carried out during the tenure of former LIT chairman Raman Balasubramanium.

news.title: Piramal Capital bets big on developer financing loans
news.para: While most non-banks have burnt their fingers with such loans in the past, they are focusing on low yielding developer advances to reputed builders as the preferred route to expand the wholesale book.

news.title: Aaryan Infrabuild to buy 7,400 sq yard plot Rs 200 crore in Ahmedabad
news.para: City-based Aaryan Infrabuild Pvt Ltd has finalized the deal with owners of the plot and it will launch a project on the plot soon, said reliable sources.

news.title: Delhi High Court summons directors of Ansal Properties
news.para: "Prima facie", the real estate developer and a finance company have "not only concealed material facts and misled this court, they have also acted in a manner so as to circumvent/frustrate the order(s) passed by this court", the high court said in an order passed this week.

news.title: CCI conducts searches at India Cements' Chennai office
news.para: India Cements said, "Certain officials of CCI visited our office in Chennai at around 11:30 a.m. and are conducting 'search' to find out if any irregularities concerning 'Competition Commission' has occurred."

news.title: Godrej Properties to develop 14.27 acres land in Gurugram
news.para: The proposed development will comprise predominantly of premium residential apartments and will have an estimated revenue potential of approximately Rs 3,000 crore.

news.title: Haryana RERA penalises five builders in Gurugram for delayed delivery
news.para: Identity Buildtech Private Limited has been fined for not completing its project Ansal Highland Park at Sector 103 within the declared timeline of June 2022. In this case, the authority has allowed the RERA registration to be in force till May 2024.

news.title: Yes Bank transfers invoked shares of Avantha Realty, Vadraj Cement, others to JC Flowers
news.para: In the case of Avantha Realty, Yes Bank said it has transferred invoked equity shares aggregating to 10,08,598 (representing 30 per cent of the total share capital of the company) to JC Flowers.

news.title: Mahindra Lifespaces completes acquisition of 9.24 acres land in Mumbai
news.para: Total consideration for the transaction is Rs 365 crore to be paid in tranches and interest of 7% per annum payable during the interim period of payment of unpaid principal balance from the sale date.

news.title: Indore administration identifies 10 places to build apartments for EWS category
news.para: ADM Rajesh Rathod said, the state government has released a policy-2022 for developing ‘Su-Raj Colony’ on public-private-partnership (PPP) mode and without using government’s fund.

news.title: JK Paints & Coatings to acquire 60% shares of Acro Paints
news.para: JK Paints and Coatings plans to initially (at first tranche) invest an amount of Rs 153 crore for the acquisition of Acro Paints. Remaining 40% shall be acquired over a period of 12 months as per the definitive agreement entered between the parties.

news.title: India mulls rules for quicker resolution of builders' insolvency
news.para: The proposed change to the nation’s Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code will permit resolution of the cases on a project-wise basis, the people said, asking not to be named, as the information is not public.

news.title: NGT forms panel for factual report on illegal brick kilns in Uttar Pradesh
news.para: The tribunal passed the order while hearing a petition claiming illegal operation of a large number of brick kilns in the districts of Moradabad, Sambhal, Rampur and Amroha was causing "huge air pollution."
